snippet.title: Season 12: Cruel Pursuit launching on July 3rd
snippet.description:
Solo Knight Season 12: Cruel Pursuit launching on July 3rd!
 
- S12: Cruel Pursuit is available now

- Exclusive event Season Hunting Ground has been reopened with fully upgraded and more new bosses waiting to be challenged

- Added and optimized several Ascendant Attributes

- S12 limited skin chest "Ultimate Fist King" is now available, S11 ranking skin "Minotaur" has been distributed

————————————

Solo Knight is a hardcore Diablo-like game that has been designed and polished for 5 years. Come and create your Build from more than 200 pieces of equipment and 600 perks.Massive contents await you to explore.

▍Official website
http://www.soloknight.com/

▍Downlaod
IOS：https://apps.apple.com/app/solo-knight/id1466765612
Google Paly：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Shimmer.SoloKnight

▍Community
Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/gaming/soloknighten
YouTube：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrC8y9_K1OF3wtqnwYPAz2A
Discord：https://discord.gg/h8fetDN

▍Contact us
soloknight@shimmergames.com
